review: Fire TV Stick has done what Roku could not.  It has made me a streaming fool.  I have a Roku 3 and have never stayed glued to the tube like I have with Fire TV Stick.  I have been on Prime Video constantly since it arrived.  Great product.  Great interface.  Smooth streaming.  Love it.
author: Chad Gaines "Blender"

review: I also have a chrome stick and find I prefer this over it for use.
author: Richard Fraley

review: I'm pleasantly pleased with the Fire TV Stick. I'm still learning what I can watch and do with it--but it loads fast plus the remote and interface are intuitive. For the most part, I can run the remote without even looking at it. I can't say that with the remote for my TV or my DVD player. I took it on the road with me recently and used it at the hotel--and it worked great! I love that it's portable.
author: Brigette
